name: Shibuya Machine Omega
description: Shibuya Machine Omega is a 2D side-scrolling platform game similar to existing titles such as Super Mario Bros. (Nintendo, 1985), Mega Man (Capcom, 1987) and Shovel Knight (Yacht Club Games, 2014). Gameplay is focussed upon negotiating platforms, solving environmental puzzles and defeating enemies to get to the end of each level. The game has a PEGI 12 rating and its target platform is PC, Sony Playstation 4, Microsoft Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.
